definitions.definition: A shapeless or amorphous mass; a vague shape or amount , especially of a liquid or semisolid substance; a clump , group or collection that lacks definite shape.
( astronomy ) A large cloud of gas.

subdefinitions.definition: Ellipsis of extended Lyman-Alpha blob , a huge body of gas that may be the precursor to a galaxy .

definitions.definition: A small freshwater fish ( Cottus bairdii ); the miller's thumb.
The partially inflated air bag used in the sport of blobbing .
( sports , slang ) A score of zero .
( as the blob ) Physarum polycephalum , a bright yellow acellular slime mold known for solving puzzles , making decisions, etc. without a nervous system .
